description: Redevelopment to provide four new buildings for use as offices (Class B1), 53 residential units including affordable housing, retail (Class A1), restaurant/ancillary bar (Class A3) and underground parking for residential and commercial uses, modifications to Ham Yard, creation of amenity space and landscaping and new pedestrian route from Denman Street to Great Windmill Street - variation of scheme approved 22 December 2003 (RN: 01/07266); namely, omission of underground public car park (but retained parking for proposed uses) with consequential alterations to the servicing and residential parking areas.
secondary_street_name: 35-36 Great Windmill Street, 14-18 Ham Yard And 1 - 7 Smith's Court
